channel.title: Help Plz And TY!
channel.description:
Ok, whenever I try to play MoparScape, it always says, "Error Connecting to server. Must be down. Click 'Cancel' then 'Start Server' to make your own.". Then, when I finally get on(takes about 5-12 times :mad:), after about 30 seconds, it will say "Connection Lost. Preparing to Re-Establish.". Then it makes me go back to the Loggin screen and I gotta do everything over again.
It is raining Semi-Hard where I live currently atm(at the moment). Would that have any affect with me getting onto a server?
Also, how do I make this just let me on and play for longer than a puny 30 seconds???

item.title: Help Plz And TY!
item.dc:creator: @Database445 Database445
item.description:
@Database445 wrote:

I’ve tried like tons of them. It says in green colored letters, “Server Online!”. Then I tried to make my own. I typed in a couple of server names and it says they’re Offline. It’s sooo weird!

Read full topic

item.title: Help Plz And TY!
item.dc:creator: @Database445 Database445
item.description:
@Database445 wrote:

What should I hange them both to? What’s the best one(s) if you know? And I checked the Server Status and all of them say, “Server Online”[br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2007, 12:35:05 PM[/size][hr]Ok. Now I changed the Port # to “6667” and IP to: jubiigames.dk.quakenet.org.

Then it said, “Unexpected server response. Please try using a different world.” Now what?

Read full topic

item.title: Help Plz And TY!
item.dc:creator: @Soule Soule
item.description:
@Soule wrote:

Well the server must be down, or you might have the wrong port.

Read full topic
